text: Nnole, nigunimmwene palashi jwa langi ja liu, na ankwelilejo lina lyakwe ni Shiwo, na Kundamo ja bhawilenje alikagula nnyuma. Na bhalabhonji nigubhapegwilwenje mashili ga tagwala, shipande shimo nngabhanyaga shilambolyo pa sheshe, bhaabhulaganje bhandu kwa upanga, na kwa shibhanga, na kwa ilwele, na kwa bhannyama bha jogoya bha pa shilambolyo.
